testcase.name: test_8_get_sports_empty_response

error.message: {'articles': [{'content': 'Real Madrid and Liverpool will face off in the Champions League final this Saturday. Both teams are in top form and are expected to deliver an exciting match.', 'id': 1, 'title': 'Champions League Final: Real Madrid vs Liverpool'}, {'content': 'The NBA Finals are heating up as the Los Angeles Lakers take on the Brooklyn Nets in a highly anticipated showdown. LeBron James and Kevin Durant will lead their respective teams in a battle for the championship title.', 'id': 2, 'title': 'NBA Finals: Los Angeles Lakers vs Brooklyn Nets'}, {'content': 'The group stage of the FIFA World Cup 2022 has concluded with some surprising results. Favorites like Brazil and Germany have advanced to the knockout stage, while underdogs like Iceland and Senegal have also impressed with their performances.', 'id': 3, 'title': 'FIFA World Cup 2022: Group Stage Results'}, {'content': 'The Wimbledon Championships are set to begin next week, with top tennis players from around the world competing for the prestigious title. Defending champions Novak Djokovic and Ashleigh Barty will face tough competition as they aim to retain their titles.', 'id': 4, 'title': 'Tennis: Wimbledon Championships Preview'}, {'content': 'The Monaco Grand Prix delivered plenty of excitement and drama as Lewis Hamilton secured victory after a thrilling race. The tight streets of Monte Carlo provided a challenging circuit for drivers, making for an unforgettable event.', 'id': 5, 'title': 'Formula 1: Monaco Grand Prix Highlights'}]} is not false

testcase.name: test_9_get_political_empty_response

error.message: {'articles': [{'content': 'The top U.S. intelligence official warned Congress of an alarming rise in cyberattacks at a hearing on global threats Thursday.', 'id': 1, 'title': 'U.S. intelligence chief warns Congress of rise in cyberattacks'}, {'content': 'Americans overwhelmingly hold an unfavorable view of China, with an increasing number labeling the nation as an enemy of the United States, according to a Pew Research Center survey released Wednesday.', 'id': 2, 'title': 'China is an enemy of the U.S. for a growing number of Americans, Pew poll shows.'}, {'content': 'You could see some banks either fail or at least, you know, dip below their minimum capital requirements,Christopher Wolfe, managing director and head of North American banks at Fitch Ratings, told CNBC.', 'id': 3, 'title': 'Why hundreds of U.S. banks may be at risk of failure.'}]} is not false
